website_summaries.verdict: We like this vest because of its clever design, which packs a lot of storage in a lightweight vest.
pros: Removable back panel for cooling in the heat
Additional Velcro pockets on the inside
Clever design makes for a very useful vest
cons: This is a longer vest, so some might find it restrictions motion for fly fishing

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after wearing it three times.  NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Wore it three times over a week perios and the (large) side pocket zipper broke. The zipper (clasp, is it?) just ran right off the end of the zipper and poof now I have a large flapping nothing of a pocket. What to do? Should I try to REPAIR the zipper or should I SEND IT BACK? A real pain in the azz. Other than the BROKEN ZIPPER I kind of like the vest.
customer_reviews.author: PokingPumasWithSpoons

customer_reviews.title: DON'T HESITATE - THIS IS THE ONE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a vest for use in the Mohave Desert. I needed one for photography, wallet, phone, water, maps and all the other stuff I find necessary. This vest is absolutely perfect. Almost purchased a Weekender and I'm sure glad I didn't. It's construction is excellent, and the material top quality - light weight, water resistant and a really nice feel. The number of pockets are more than adequate, and the zip down back panel couldn't be more perfect for the desert in summer. Can't believe a vest of this quality is available at such a modest price. DON'T HESITATE - THIS IS THE ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkwing

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Well Made Vest
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you aren't wearing a full coat underneath, the vest does not fit small...it's the coat! Made the mistake of listening to people and went up 1 size from a large to an XL and it was HUGE. Promptly returned and re-ordered a L and it fit perfectly with room to spare. New vest was received the next day and so was the refund. Amazing service. Extremely well thought out. The back zips down to the mesh that neatly rolls down & stores in the back pocket. Lots of room in the front pockets for photography lenses and filters etc. Would highly recommend this, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: KWgirl

customer_reviews.title: A Wildlife Photographer’s Dream
customer_reviews.text: This vest is amazing! I’ve had it for nearly two months now. It’s extremely well-made. It’s light weight. It has lots of pockets that either close via reliable Velcro or secure zippers. I use it as a wildlife photographer in the South. I love how the back layer neatly folds into a self-contained little pouch on the back of the vest so that all I have on my back is the mesh. I’ve used it on some of our hottest and most humid days and have never felt like it needs to come off. Not to mention the padding in the shoulders really helps me lug my big lens around in more comfort. Can’t recommend it highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: KatGalFloyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for wheelchair users - keeps everything close and safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY recommnd! I bought this vest for a friend who is wheelchair bound - it has so many pockets that he can carry around al of his belongings and know that they are safe. All of the pockets have a secure and yet easy to open pockets, and the mesh panel at the back keeps him cool when it is hot and he is over-heated. Can not recommend enough for wheelchair use - maybe a new way to advertise for maker? Also - very well made, have had NO trouble at all since I bought it for him over a year ago - A++++
customer_reviews.author: carpediem61

customer_reviews.title: quality, verses inferiority, this product will let you down
customer_reviews.text: It's light-weight,, comfortable, and what I hoped for, but it is quality is lacking. I bought two of these vests and both had the upper right pocket zipper to slide right off the teeth as the zipper closer went 8 inches past the the stopper. All done. Like I said I bought two, and wouldn't you know it, they both slide by their expiration points for return.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder 1996 God

customer_reviews.title: True to size - Best quality and long - not short like all others!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early this morning. I searched all over for a good quality and large size (that actually fits) for my husband - it FIT PERFECTLY - not tight and not too big. Size does not run small - but true to size- finally! Beautiful lightweight quality - good stitching - and plenty of pockets that wont allow items to fall out as you open pockets. This is a real find - thank you Amazon and great seller- Will definitely buy another and from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: moondog

customer_reviews.title: Works well but Chinese sizing...3X-Large not so good
customer_reviews.text: The vest is light weight and that was an important reason for my purchase. Plenty of pockets.....another reason for the purchase. Seems to be well made. My only negative is the sizing. I read the size chart and picked the size that met my usual sizing. I weigh 250. Vest fits my shoulders but needs to be about 1 inch bigger in the chest allowing some expansion area. It zips but is tight. I'll live with that as I will wear it mostly unzipped anyway. So many Chinese clothing products are in our economy now it is certainly challenging to find the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn Man

customer_reviews.title: Super practical multi-pocket vest
customer_reviews.text: If you want to carry lots of personal equipment (photo, fishing, outdoors, mechanic work) without schlepping a large bag around, this vest from Autumn Ridge is the right choice. Lightweight, breathable mesh and comfortable padding inside the shoulder section makes it very wearable and comfortable. True to size, although if you plan to fill up all the pockets with things, you might want to up a size. Color choices are great too. We have two (a beige and an olive green) and they both look great.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto (AKA Robertdoc)

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest. Carefully check sizing though to avoid return shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Vest was nice and lightweight. I really liked the zip out back to keep things cool. But even the XXXL was too small. I give the vest a 5, but the overall rating is a 3 b/c of the sizing and the fact I had to pay to return it. I'm disappointed I have to pay return shipping!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Seems like high quality, failure in sizing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and it arrived in one day. All the pockets are great. Material is great. Seems like high quality. My issue is that it’s useless to me if I want to zipper it. I ordered a XXXXL. I wear a 2xl, but I wanted it to be not too tight and to leave room for chest high waders and a coat underneath for Winter fishing. I can’t zip this even with just a t-shirt on. Very disappointed. It’s slimiest as if they took an extra large and just sewed a 4xl tag onto this. It’ll be going back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: GuyFromPhilly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this vest - SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very comfortable to wear and the pockets are well laid out. The vest appears to be well made. All n all, I am very pleased - so far. The real test will be in the months ahead. Will the zippers last and stitching last. The zippers are always a concern, more so than the stitching. It arrived quickly and was the right size and color. I believe I have made a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Fox

customer_reviews.title: And it's a perfect fit! He loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited with his Father's Day gift! He spent 20 minutes just zipping-unzipping, folding-unfolding, expanding-contracting pockets... checking out all the features of the fishing vest, all the while complimenting Autumn Ridge Traders on the clever and efficient design of the vest. And it's a perfect fit! He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have never before owned a vest like this. I need one for a safari trip to east Africa. I did a TON of research before deciding on this one. The price was excellent. When it arrived, I was stunned at all the great and original features, such as the ability to unzip the back and store it in a convenient pocket without completely detaching it. This provides excellent ventilation. The craftsmanship and materials seem to be of superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Nephews was a hit !
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 fishing vests (L,L,M) for my nephews ages 18-25 for Christmas. The vest was a hit with them, even though they don't fish! I read an article that said fishing vests are a new trend for guys just needing pockets to carry things in !! Had to order a small, and return the medium, but no problem with the vest at all -- just guessed wrong on one size. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but great vest!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6’4” and weighs 260 pounds. He normally wears an XLT. I had ordered a XXXL, because it was rated as running small. It fit well with room if he wanted to wear a hoody under it. It is made well and has many useful pockets. The back of the vest can be unzipped to reveal a mesh back for when it is hot. My husband likes this vest a lot for when he goes out and takes pictures of sporting events. Great product, but runs small. I would order two sizes above what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: This is the vest you want!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great! The color is very nice. The pockets are plentiful and roomy. This weight of the vest is just right, I don't think I will get warm in it, even in a very hot day. Some reviews have said the size runs small, while others said the size runs large. I normally wear a 2XL, so based on some reviews and the size chart, I ordered a 3XL. It was a little tight for me so I exchanged it for the 4XL and it is perfect. I'm an aspiring amateur photographer and I can't wait to use it for all my gear.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found a vest I can travel with that eliminates my "man bag". It is light until I load the pockets with my stuff. As a previous reviewer stated it has so many pockets I tend to forget which pocket I put certain items in. The zippers work fine as does the velcro. I cannot attest to how it does in hot climates yet. I bought it in a size larger so I could wear it over a sweater or jacket comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Isaac

customer_reviews.title: beware The vest comes saturated with a fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I give it a five on design, but hated the perfume smell, so averaged them. I loved the vest, and all the pockets, I can fit my car keys, bird book (just), and binoculars, snacks and lots more in, but the incredibly strong fragrance almost made me send it back. I left it outside to air for a day and then a day in the garage - didn't help. Then I washed it twice in just water, still smelled but better, washed with soap. I can still smell it but its faint enough for me to wear now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality good, sizing small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He is very satisfied with the quality of the material, the number of pockets and the fit. His one negative comment was about the sizing. He wears big man sizes (2-3XL) but after reading comments about this vest, and the fact that the sizing runs small, I ordered the 4XL. He was glad I did since it fits comfortably when zipped up but hates the idea he needed a 4XL size. This was the only company I found that offered sizing above XL or 2XL, so I was relieved to find the quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great vest.
customer_reviews.text: Great vest...I use it when metal detecting. It's lightweight and cool. The back detaches from the top and rolls up into a zippered pocket at the bottom...leaving the entire back mesh. More that enough storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph in Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight but very well made. Lots pockets for all my fishing gear. If your 235 and 6’1” tall then the 3X size is probably perfect. 1 day shipping from Amazon was perfect. I emailed Autumn Ridge with question. Man their fast and helpful. Don’t hesitate. If your not needing the short wader style vest then this vest is the exact need!!! Happy Fishing
customer_reviews.author: R. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great  vest...but a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest, it is very light, looks very durable, and pretty well made. The only issue, and the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, is the fit. It's really on the small side for the listed size. I recommend it, but I'd advise you to size up at least one size, and two sizes if you want a looser fit. These sellers are excellent though, with great communication. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Trauma Doc

customer_reviews.title: NO!!!  BOTH had zipper failures out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Out of the box: the main zipper was misaligned, never worked. And the Velcro on little pocket was not functioning properly (wasn’t sticking) causing important items to fall out when I bend over. Not worth hassle to return... ******UPDATE, ordered another one (didn’t do a return), unfortunately ZIPPER BROKEN on this second best as well. No way I recommend this vest. Am hoping seller reaches out to fix, since I’ve now paid for two vests, both zipper-fiascos.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I am retired, living in Southern California and I need such a vest for working in my large home garden. It has to be lightweight, (coastal climate) and have plenty of pockets for tools, seeds, etc. This vest is the exact vest I have been looking for. Size fits as expected. I am 6' 200,ordered the XL... Shipped on time and actually packaged better than I expected. Even a follow up Email fron the company was a nice addition. Very nice purchase on my part.
customer_reviews.author: T. Judson

customer_reviews.title: I love this vest
customer_reviews.text: Great product - lots of pockets to hold everything I need on my photography outings. It is a pleasure to use. As far as sizing, I bought XL although I usually wear L, because I don't like things to be tight and I wanted to leave room for warmer clothing in the winter, and the XL is a bit larger than I expected. That's okay, though, because it's a utility vest, not a fashion vest. I would probably get the XL again if I were getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: patriot1123

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality sold in a Family Business.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Outdoor Fly Fishing Vest as a Christmas gift for my husband. Just opening the parcel, I could tell the sturdy fabric was made in a full size for him and also that it was very well made. I fully recommend Autumn Ridge Traders as a business that carries quality items, based on this one purchase. Not only are they a family business, they care about the customer's satisfaction, as they do a follow up to make certain the customer is pleased with their purchase. I highly recommend doing business with Autumn Ridge Traders.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, good construction
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use on safari. Like the attach points and it can be vented. Though no issues, concerned about main zipper. Teeth seem a bit too fine. Can easy get snagged or damaged in fishing. As stated I’ve not experienced it just observation in comparison to other outdoor use zippers
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality in this Item is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest to use for travel and camera lens. Within six the pocket zipper broke. My wife was able to repair it. Within one year two other zipper broke. These were unrepairable, contrast that with a Trail Design Vest that is 30 years old and has never lost a zipper. I'm in the market for a new vest but would never buy or recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Abner Burgos-Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in sizing...
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great quality with lots of storage, however, I am only giving a 3 rating because of the sizing. I wear a 2XL shirt and bought this to wear over a shirt or light Jacket. Thinking a XXXXL would be large enough. I was sooo disappointed to find I could not button this, even with no shirt on. I will pass the vest on to one of the children.. Very, very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: I found the sizing to be a little smaller than what I actually wear coat wise. I did a simple return through Amazon and purchased the next size larger. The vest is very well made. For my needs, the pocket layout is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Griff

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is set for the petite
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is way, way off but quality is acceptable... order way bigger than you think you need (even compared to the Amazon equivalency sizing)
customer_reviews.author: Geriatric Suthriner

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this vest
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this vest. It is well made, light weight, and fits just as the size implies. I ordered XL and the vest fits comfortably over my XL shirts. It will probably fit over my lighter weight jackets as well. Shipping was expeditious and arrived on time. The sellers followed up quickly to ensure my satisfaction with the order and responded quickly to my complimentary email.
customer_reviews.author: Pecos D

customer_reviews.title: Nice for travel
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of pockets and light weight. I was hoping for just what I got. I bought a 4X because I am big. (6'3" 300) It fits nicely but not generously. If you're a big person order a size up from your usual and you should be rewarded.
customer_reviews.author: just another Amazon nut

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing vest for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fishing vest for my boyfriend for his birthday and he absolutely loves it!! Thanks to the customer video review I was able to select the appropriate size. My boyfriend is 6'2" about 230lbs so I bought him a XXL and it fits perfectly! This is not just a fly fishing vest, we will be using it for trout and bass fishing and it will work just fine. If you are looking for a durable, lightweight, great quality fishing vest at an actually reasonable price, then this fishing vest is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 68 year old who has been a fisherman most of my life. Over that time, I've bought a number of fishing vests. Some I used for years. While others didn't even last a season. I love my new Autumn Ridge vest. It is very well constructed and I get the impression that it will last for a long time of heavy use. If you're trying to decide on which of the many vests to chose from on Amazon, I would encourage you to consider the Autumn Ridge. You'll be pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Magical1

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t believe the sizes. These are much smaller than you think. I had to return mine because it was way too small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I did a search for a youth vest and this came up. Thinking it was a youth I ordered it for my wife, medium, it was of course a men's Med so it was entirely too big. Very nice vest however had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Vest Is Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vest. Light yet durable. Fold down back flap exposing mesh back is a neat feature. I live and fish in Sierras and it can get surprisingly hot. Lots of pockets and are well placed. Appears to be well made but i'm always initially leery of plastic zippers so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Allday

customer_reviews.title: The vest fits great. Arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.text: The vest fits great. Arrived very quickly. I wear an XL shirt. Fits perfect even over a heavy sweatshirt with extra room remaining. Great quality and very light weight. Side note: Be sure to take your measurements first and contact the seller to get their opinion on what size before ordering. Very important!!! I would recommend this vest to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: jsguitar

customer_reviews.title: vest
customer_reviews.text: real nice color, loads of pockets. Can be worn when you go out camera shooting, fishing or any outdoor fun you can think of; did I mention the many pockets? Seniors like it since they can carry all of their stuff without having to have a large bag.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Cortez III

customer_reviews.title: Hard to come by, Until Now.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Vest, I wanted to use this vest in my travels, I plan to have my Viet Nam Patches / Ten Thousand Hour Volunteer for National Park sew on.....I really love all the pockets and zippers and Netting on the backside.
customer_reviews.author: PrinceofKona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with this vest. He is 6'3" tall with 44" chest, this XXL gives him extra room, so he can wear the vest over a thick sweater. He is most pleased with it because it was made in the USA, not a foreign country. We are rubbing some candle wax over the zipper to make it smooth pulling. He will be using it to store camera, cell phone, binoculars, snacks, water...when we go on hiking trips.
customer_reviews.author: KSU70

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for keeping things handy
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my partner. He has two now and wears them around the office and at home to keep keys, phone etc. handy. It's nice that it is light weight so it can be worn indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Rakhi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fitment was a little too big and the zipper fell off when I opened the bag on my right
customer_reviews.author: Albert Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great all-purpose vest!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up for when pockets might be loaded for expansion purposes. If you don't anticipate ever loading pockets just order your regular size. Breathability, nice pockets, good zipper, light weight, and good looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like all the pockets. Very useful for finding keys with key strap. I don't use a purse. I never have to dig in a purse to find anything. Very light weight so excellent t for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I had a zipper go bad and the company sent me a new vest. Very nice people to work with. There are a lot of pockets and you have to remember what is where—perhaps too many. Use a US size when you purchase do not oversize for Asain.
customer_reviews.author: Wagie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price and High Utility for a Trip Overseas
customer_reviews.text: The vest seems to be well made, has a lot of pockets and fits very well. I wish a different color had been available. Planning to wear it this summer in Scotland and England. Karl R. Bossi Author: Just Call Me Moose: Growing Up Italian in America on Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Karl from Boston

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had is less than a month and stitches were coming. Pockets too shallow and lack reinforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight vest with plenty of pockets for taking photographs in the field. This vest fits my needs perfectly. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bjproducts

customer_reviews.title: Great photography vest
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to be used as a photography vest, and it's great. The large pockets hold my lenses with room to spare. I'm not even sure I've found all the pockets yet. I used the size guide and had to return it for the next size up. The return process could not have been easier. Bottom line, I love the vest and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i really want to like this vest
customer_reviews.text: i really want to like this vest. i like having all the pockets to have access to my things while canoe camping. Sizing seems to run big as I now realize i may have been able to pull off a medium. I wish it were more durable. Theres a lot of fraying at the seams and the zippers dont seem constructed very well for longevity
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected - very good quality and it was longer and that was good because my husband is tall and he doesn't like the short vests. There were plenty of pockets to put whatever he needed in. This vest is not a heavy one & easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: All in all a good, sturdy fishing vest
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Plenty of pockets for everything you need to take along the stream with you. Lightweight, vent in back a bonus. Quality construction, zippers and closures work well. All in all a good, sturdy fishing vest. Recommended. Customer service from Autumn Ridge is great. They seem genuinely interested in customer feedback. Good company to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: A. Banks

customer_reviews.title: pocket size is perfect for this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest to use while metal detecting. The construction, durability, pocket size is perfect for this. Light weight, so you want get hot wearing it while out in the fields! A Great looking vest! Any Metal Detecting hunter will want to add this to their "finds" as you will have plenty of room for your discoveries. Thanks Autumn Ridge and Happy Hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Topshelf Crow

customer_reviews.title: After unpacking looks very well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to store my camera gear on me as we take a trip to Norway & Iceland, Walking a glacier, and want to be able to have some place to carry spare batteries, SD cards and multiple lens. After unpacking, it looks very well constructed. many pockets. Should double well for fishing too based on what I am seeing. Thank you for the quick shipping. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: mikeypw

customer_reviews.title: Gone Fishing
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this vest. Wonderful quality and for great price. Love supporting usa company. Gone Fishing .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A winner.
customer_reviews.text: This is the Goldilocks vest. The weight is just right. The number and location of pockets is just right. The fit is just right. The utility is just right for my purposes. And finally, the price is just right.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Mason

customer_reviews.title: We were super impressed with this vest for my favorite photographer
customer_reviews.text: We were super impressed with this vest for my favorite photographer! It’s light-weight and fits great. I purchased the medium. He’s 5-11 and about 195lbs. He’s going on a trip to Minnesota and the length is perfect for sitting in a canoe. He’s used it birdwatching and it’s quickly become his go to vest. The price is awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sturdy vest. Lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vest. Once I got the right size it was perfect. Plenty of pockets and those are roomy. Got this to manage my photo gear. It's well made and sturdy and I like the back being able to fold down to make the vest cooler to wear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blasterman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Glad that I bought this vest. Started volunteering at the local zoo and having a nice, lite weight vest is wonderful. With all of the pockets available, I am able to put most of what I carry in my camera bag in the vest pockets. Not that I don't mind carrying my camera bag but not having to carry it and just reach in one of the pockets to grab something makes getting a perfect shot with my camera that much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The construction is worse than that done by a junior high student failing home economics class. I would be embarrassed to send out a product like this if it were my company. After seeing the shoddy workmanship, I returned the vest.
customer_reviews.author: S Piery

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as Photography Vest
customer_reviews.text: The vest just arrived and I like it so far. I purchased this as a photography vest. I am not sure if a large lens will be comfortable in a pocket, but for all smaller stuff, this is ideal. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoNative

customer_reviews.title: Vest is very lightwetght and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Vest is very lightwetght and comfortable to wear. I wpold have given 5 stars except for the plastic zipper, i had a problem with it the second time i zipped it up. Unfortunatly it seems almost everyone has gone to the plastic zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is EXACTLY what I wanted and I am thoroughly pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had shopped locally (in Marietta, GA) and could not find what I was looking for. The picture and description seemed to be exactly what I was looking for. Once I received the Vest, it is EXACTLY what I wanted and I am thoroughly pleased with this purchase. Thank you Mike and Lisa!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great vest at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This vest is super lightweight and has more pockets than I could ever use for a day of fishing. It’s high quality stitching and construction mean I don’t have to worry about hiking through brush to get to my favorite fishing spot. The longer cut also helps hide my ever growing “fish aren’t biting time to start drinking” gut.
customer_reviews.author: Steven  Hamrell

customer_reviews.title: It Helps
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a bad hip that makes it difficult for me to do much walking. So I use this vest not for fishing or photography, but for stocking up with items at one end of the house and carrying them to the other. This minimizes the trips back and forth that I have to make. It's working quite well for me; the only thing I have to do is remember which pocket I put which things in!
customer_reviews.author: Ninashalina

customer_reviews.title: A very well designed fishing vest
customer_reviews.text: Will be putting this item to work in a couple of weeks, but I can review fit and finish and some functionality by virtue of packing the pockets. Fit is good. At 6'4", I appreciate the garment length. Take note that chest and waist sizes are the same. If you have a baby bump, this may not be for you unless you select a larger size. On the finish side, I found lots of loose threads, particularly in the zipper pockets. That means lots of zipper snags unless you take the time the manufacturer should have taken to clean this up. Otherwise a fine garment at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MPG

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This company has the best customer service I have ever had to deal with. From the first purchase, through having to return and get a different size, they were so helpful and also wanting to make sure we were more than satisfied with our purchase and experience! I would seek this company out again in a heart beat in the future! And after getting the size I needed, the vest was exactly as described and worked out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: way cool
customer_reviews.text: Well, feels great, wears light, just one of my favorite buys! Its so light, I just hope it last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest for camping with Scouts. The motto, "cotton is rotten" is what I use when looking for camping equipment. This vest is 100% Poly with NO cotton. It is darker than I expected. I would call it a light brown or mocha. The vest is very functional, lightweight, and vented. I will be referring my Scouts to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Its easy to store lots of everything in every size
customer_reviews.text: Vest has many pockets are sized well. Its easy to store lots of everything in every size. Many of pockets have zippers so storing your license, wallet or keys is really easy and safe. Be sure to get this vest at least a size larger than you need as it was designed for fairly thin people. If you've built a fairly good size shelter over your tools get the vest two sizes larger than you need.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Photographer's Vest
customer_reviews.text: I love the vest. Just as you described. As a photographer this vest works great to put all my essentials in that I need for a shoot, plus it's very comfortable. I like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Minutes

customer_reviews.title: Craftmanship.....Best in Class.
customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship. Lots and lots of pockets. Fit is very comfortable and cool in Florida heat and humidity. Made in USA by small company which provides outstanding customer service. How do I know? They sent me thank you email when I bought it, and when I received it in the mail card attached shows they care, and are trustful and best in class. Thanks for your excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Ltjg Don L. Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Fly Fishing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hiking with my dogs actually. I'm always struggling with where my keys are, where my phone is, where the xtra leashes are, did I drop them and have to retrace my steps through the desert........ now, I can just organize everything in the pockets and take off, dogs off leash, camera in hand!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight with lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Father’s Day. He tried it on and loves it. He can’t wait to use it while fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Huppe

customer_reviews.title: I like to wear the vest over a hooded sweatshirt when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made vest with plenty of pockets for all your fishing gear. I like to wear the vest over a hooded sweatshirt when trout fishing and it is quite comfortable. I would recommend buying one size larger than you normally wear as the vests seem to run a little smaller. Great vest for the money overall.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Shifflette

customer_reviews.title: Main zipper failed on first use
customer_reviews.text: ...with no more stress than simply walking around the yard. I am returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Peggi

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Vest.  And you can even use it fishing.
customer_reviews.text: I use them for air travel. I take it off when going through security and it has everything in it. I don't have empty my pockets. I also have all I need right with me in my flight seat. Inflatable pillow, Kendal, ear plugs, wallet, phone, and all the other little thing that you may want to pack.
customer_reviews.author: P. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the vest as a gift, but it seems very well made. The color was perfect and was as described by seller. I will update review once my son uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely PERFECT!! My husband says this is the best fishing vest he's ever had (and he has had several). I had to return and reorder because the first one was too small, and customer service replied to my email right away with instructions. Returned the small one on Wednesday and had the replacement one on Friday! Best customer service I have ever dealt with. I hope my husband finds more items to order from this awesome business!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Great VESTS!!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in record time. The one thing we noticed that we wished were different in these vests is that there are no side pockets...but with so many other pockets who cares?
customer_reviews.author: Beth Barrows

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Liked this vest, wish the zipper was stronger mine split down the middle, but I got it to work again
customer_reviews.author: david evey

customer_reviews.title: Quick and exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight with great accessibility. Looking forward to using it on my next fishing trip
customer_reviews.author: Timothy G. Bowe

customer_reviews.title: Multiple pockets
customer_reviews.text: This vest was a replacement of a 2018 Christmas gift to our son-in-law. The original vest we purchased was too small. Could not find correct size in the store it was purchased from, so went online. He will use it as a fly fishing vest. My son-in-law really likes all the pockets, light weight and able to move around for fly fishing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Monica D. Brundeen

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad small at the waist
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and looks like it will do fine, ordered 3x and not all 3x are the same. A little small by about 1.5 inch to zip and I don't see this as a problem, by fishing time it should fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT  DAMIANO

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The vest is exactly what I was expecting it to be and more. It allows me to carry all of my lenses, various filters, batteries, pens, notebook, and other accessories. The size is exactly as described. I am very impressed with the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: A bigger size.
customer_reviews.text: Am a 56 across the chest been this way sent 16 ... a large size.
customer_reviews.author: wildturkey

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: Great vest got it the other day. Pulled it from the box and my wife & girlfriend was impressed. I have not used it for work yet But I will very soon. I love all the pockets and the panel in the back that opens up.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of vests!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome! Quality is great, lots of pockets and the key as always quality zippers. I will be using this vest for the KY Derby and Our Annual tradition of War and Bourbon, a weekend of axis and allies and bourbon tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Murph

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vest for my husband he usually takes a 2XL I did buy him the 4 XL two sizes bigger like previous reviews had said he is extremely happy with this vest it does have many pockets and the back can be opened for airflow really really nice I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.text: Much better made than it has any right to be at this price. I’ve now used it 2-3 times a week for a couple of months fly fishing and I am totally happy with the purchase. More pockets than I need and everything seems to be well put together. All the zippers are holding up and despite a fair bit of use, still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Blaize Feduchin-Pate

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father in law for Christmas, he loves it! Now my husband and brother in law want one too. Thank you, he can’t wait to use it. Even though he wore it all day around the house. Order him up a size since it’s cut straight, and he has a little bit of a belly.
customer_reviews.author: whitney russell

customer_reviews.title: The exchange program is very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.text: The vest that I received seemed to be perfect in detail. But I have to use it before I can review it properly. You are asking for a review too quick.The vest i tried on seemed to have all the pockets in the right place. The zippers should be of a heavier duty but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Merrell rrell Branstetter

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing vest so far..
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves the vest it's a little snug on him cause I got him a 3x large, I should've gone with the 4x large if they had one, but other than that he is in love with his vest!! Nice craftmanship & good quality too!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this vest!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest! It is worth the extra money over similar vests. I am still finding hidden pockets! All of the pockets are useful. I use it to hold all of my items as a rideshare driver rather than use a purse. That way when I jump out of the car to help customers, all of my stuff is on me. There was a little problem with the first vest which had a stuck zipper but the company was great and acted quickly on a replacement.Love this vest and Autumn Ridge Traders! Buy from them!
customer_reviews.author: Zita

customer_reviews.title: Generic Product
customer_reviews.text: It’s very generic so not optimum for me, but it’ll do.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Valaris

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor activity vest
customer_reviews.text: Nice layout, lots of pockets, nice mesh lining. Also the sizing chart was accurate, but you have to measure your self with a tape measure, then the use the chart. I am usually a large or extra large, but this vest fits as a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have one very happy fisherman!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a good amount of time searching for a fishing vest for my fiance for Valentine's Day and I chose this one. When reading the reviews I saw many that said it ran small, so I ordered an XXL (he normally wears an XL t-shirt). The vest arrived quickly, was well packaged, well made and it fit PERFECTLY! He is one happy fisherman. I recommend this vest for anyone looking for a good quality product for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Autumn Ridge Traders Fly Fishing Photography Climbing Vest with 16 Pockets Made with Lightweight Mesh Fabric for Travelers, Sports, Hiking, Bird Watching, River Guide Adventures and Hunting.
product_meta.description:
You barely know it’s there – till you need your gear! This vest wins on fit, storage capacity and comfort.

The faster you can begin your day fishing on the lake, river or shore or hiking and climbing your favorite spot – the better. Our outdoor vest can be pre-packed and ready to go the minute you reach your destination. Add tackle box items, cell phones, maps, camera equipment and passports when you're ready to hit the trail for your big adventure. Having 16 pockets within easy reach on your breathable vest is perfect to hold the maximum amount of gear with balanced, easy access pockets made with either velcro or a quick zipper motion closure. Other vests might slow you down – not the vest from Autumn Ridge Traders!

100% Polyester and Mesh fabric helps to keep you cool and comfortable with air flowing as the day gets warmer. An even distribution of weight makes it feel like it’s not even there so you can concentrate on the task at hand – having a great time!

PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR SIZE BY USING OUR HANDY SIZING CHART IN THE IMAGES AREA to determine your best choice for a comfortable fit. If you're layering clothes underneath your vest you may want to order a size or two larger than you normally wear. Travel light, but always have your gear ready for your next big adventure!.

Our vest is a great compliment to other outdoor activities like hunting, biking, archery, charity walks and races, camping, safaris and traveling. It’s perfect for holding photography equipment as well. Consider the Autumn Ridge Traders vest to stow gear and keep your hands and arms free for use without holding everything or trying to strap on a bag weighted down on only one side of your body – which can lead to back pain.

Enjoy your outdoor adventures even more and ADD TO CART NOW so you’re ready to go outside and play!




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :11.3 x 7.7 x 1.1 inches; 15.2 Ounces
 * Date First Available :January 30, 2018
 * Manufacturer :Autumn Ridge Traders
 * ASIN :B07T165XL4

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #47,043 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #88 inFishing Clothing

Other vests might slow you down – not the vest from Autumn Ridge Traders!

100% Polyester and Mesh fabric helps to keep you cool and comfortable with air flowing as the day gets warmer. An even distribution of weight makes it feel like it’s not even there so you can concentrate on the task at hand – having a great time!

If you're layering clothes underneath your vest you may want to order a size or two larger than you normally wear. Travel light, but always have your gear ready for your next big adventure!.

It’s perfect for holding photography equipment as well. Enjoy your outdoor adventures even more and ADD TO CART NOW so you’re ready to go outside and play!
feature_bullets: ✔ COMFORTABLE FIT & EASE of MOVEMENT lightweight, straight, balanced vest with soft padded shoulders will fit great and keep you comfortable during all your outdoor and travel adventures.
✔ QUICK DRY WATER RESISTANT polyester fabric with breathable mesh will allow you to store your fishing gear, cell phone, wallet, keys and camera equipment safely.
✔ EASY ACCESS 16 POCKETS with velcro and zipper action will allow you to have all your gear and equipment at your fingertips so you can focus on your task.
✔ BACK OUTER SHELL tucks neatly in to a pocket revealing a breathable mesh back which will keep you cool and comfortable for hours.
✔ HANDY SIZING CHART in image area will help you find the perfect fit so can enjoy your adventures for years to come.
